welcome_message_body: Welcome to Olmaliq, Uzbekistan, a charming city known for its rich history, beautiful architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Olmaliq has to offer during your visit.

restaurants.name: Ресторан Papin House
restaurants.description: Ресторан Papin House is a restaurant located in Алмалык.
restaurants.address: Ул. Навои, в парке под название Яблоко (перекресток Чехова), 103115 Алмалык, Ташкентская область
